column4: Can someone help me?  I need awstats to work.  I can't find any help
there is no man file
! awstats
arg!
Can someone PLEASE help me?
point your web browser at file:///usr/share/doc/awstats/html/awstats_setup.html
will that explain how to setup the package?
or file:///usr/share/doc/awstats/html/index.html for the index of the awstats docs
I don't know, but that's where you can find the awstats documentation, apparently.  I've never installed it
see also /etc/awstats/awstats.conf and /etc/awstats/awstats.conf.local
i didn't find any help in there
do you see stuff at file:///usr/share/doc/awstats/html/awstats_setup.html ?  I see lots of help there
I'm not finding anything about installing from apt-get install
I found the awstats_configure.pl
you install it like: "sudo apt-get install awstats"
it gets run automatically periodically by cron
I've done that
I can't set it up because when I run awstats_configure.pl it errors out.
I see.  let me try...
looks like /usr/share/doc/awstats/README.Debian tells you how to set it up for ubuntu
hmm... i didn't see what to do in there
that looks like just what to do if you encounter those problems
